'''Pasquale Scotti''' ([[Casoria]], September 8, 1958), is an Italian [[Camorra]] boss. He has been on the "[[List of most wanted fugitives in Italy|most wanted list]]" of the Italian ministry of the Interior since [[1985]], for murder and concealment of corpse and other crimes. On January 17, 1990, an international warrant was issued against him, to be arrested for extradition.<ref>{{it icon}} [http://www.interno.it/mininterno/export/sites/default/it/sezioni/sala_stampa/notizie/polizia/app_notizia_17196.html Direzione Centrale della Polizia Criminale - "Programma Speciale di Ricerca" - SCOTTI PASQUALE]</ref>
'''Pasquale Scotti''' ([[Casoria]], September 8, 1958), is an Italian [[Camorra]] boss. He has been on the "[[List of most wanted fugitives in Italy|most wanted list]]" of the Italian ministry of the Interior since [[1985]], for murder and concealment of corpse and other crimes. On January 17, 1990, an international warrant was issued against him, to be arrested for extradition.<ref>{{it icon}} [http://www.interno.it/mininterno/export/sites/default/it/sezioni/sala_stampa/notizie/polizia/app_notizia_17196.html Direzione Centrale della Polizia Criminale - "Programma Speciale di Ricerca" - SCOTTI PASQUALE]</ref>
